lines.text: Memory backup recovery... executed... memory cannot be found. Booting up.

lines.speaker: Cortana
lines.text: Booting successful. Hello! My name is Cortana your AI companion. What can I do for you?

lines.speaker: Student
lines.text: Whe- Where am I? What is this place?!

lines.speaker: Cortana
lines.text: Threats detected! User safety status: [shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]DANGER[/shake]
